segments.text: I have a complaint to make . I've just been badly treated by a rude maid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we are sorry to hear that.May I have your name and room number ? We will deal with the matter right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Ted , I have to apologize for that and I assure you it won't happy again .
segments.speaker: S2
